lines.text: Hey, you try making love to a complete stranger in a hostile, mutant environment, see how you like it.

[to Sam]
I gotta tell you, you are one weird dude.
You have to save yourself for 'Fertiles'.
In the latter days of the 20th century, there arose a difference of opinion.
The leading experts at the time believed a nuclear war would only involve the exchange of a few bombs. And then, the suitably horrified combatants would sit down at the peace table.
They were wrong. In just 10 days, 10,000 years of human progress was virtually blown to dust.

The war reduced our male population by 68 percent. It made most of the human race sterile. But we're still at war. A population war. Each side is desperate to rebuild and rearm. Now, that requires manpower; manpower requires people. And that's where you come in.
This man is carrying a 'loaded weapon', and Medtech on a provisional government authority now claims it.

[over the loudspeaker]
Paging Dr. Howard, Dr. Fine, Dr. Howard. Dr. Howard, Dr. Fine, Dr. Howard.
